name: Savannah Aviation
about: Savannah Aviation, established in 1985, is Coastal Georgia's premier flight training, testing, and aircraft maintenance facility. As the largest and most diverse flight training center in the region, we offer personalized aviation solutions with a fleet of technologically advanced aircraft, including Cirrus models. Our team of highly trained Certified Flight Instructors and Airframe/Powerplant mechanics provide expert training in private, instrument, commercial, and transition pilot programs. We also offer specialized Cirrus training, recurrent flight training, and maintenance services that exceed FAA requirements. With a commitment to safety and excellence, Savannah Aviation is the ideal destination for aspiring pilots and aircraft owners alike, ensuring a professional, safe, and fun environment to learn and fly.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
